entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 March 2023
